Text: Am sorry to leave a comment about one show in the space for another, but I would just like to ask if you're going to (please say yes, please say yes!) upload the latest episode of Work of Art - episode 4? I really, really appreciate the episodes you've uploaded so far - and all the other work you do  - but nobody else is uploading Work of Art and it would be very, very, very much appreciated if you could please, please do so! Please?!?
